question: Which Indian author has won the 2018 Hindu Playwright Award 2018?
explanation: Annie Zaidi, an Indian author, has won the 2018 Hindu Playwright Award 2018 for her play \'Untitled\'  at the 14th edition of The Hindu Theatre Fest at the Taj Coromandel. The award was presented by Ratna Pathak Shah, actor and director. The award, instituted in 2008, carries a prize of Rs 2 lakh for the best original, unpublished and unperformed play script in English.
